name: Green for growth - reality check
description: Construction is a key factor in why the UK has suffered a double-dip recession. The construction industry is promoting spending on construction to generate economic activity, but other investments such as green infrastructure, which delivers multiple, quantifiable benefits and retrofit could also reverse the trend. What and where should we invest to get the maximum benefit?

speakers.name: Rt. Hon Michael Fallon MP
speakers.occupation: Minister for Business and Enterprise, Department of Business, Innovaton and Skills

speakers.name: Mike Putnam
speakers.occupation: Chief Executive, Skanska UK; and Co-Chair Green Construction Board

speakers.name: Professor Chris Gorse
speakers.occupation: Professor of Construction and Project Management and Director of the Centre for Knowledge Exchange, Leeds Metropolitan University
